Rolling green fields flank the path on both the left and right, stretching from the foreground to the background. A prominent group of green trees is positioned in the middle ground left, with additional scattered trees and a more distant tree line visible in the background. The bright blue sky, dotted with white clouds, fills the top portion of the frame in the background. The trees initially in the middle ground left shift further left and towards the background as the camera advances.

Groups of green, leafy trees are scattered throughout, bordering the fields and path, with the drone's forward movement creating a sense of progression through this pastoral setting.**
